body: Charu is saying he is not sure if he should change the title of that new work he has, I think that heavily implies it is a new project entirely. Neat
@test2fornow I took a look and it seems it may be a new work possibly, looks intriguing.

@nhcasual actually, the last roshutsu work, melon or mizushima 5 is 2~ years ago, and only 6 works ago, not too long ago though, since the vtuber work was like a 3 part work, in the dlsite ci-en, "ci-en.dlsite (dot) com/creator/1447/article/650492", the next work does not seem like vtuber, from the march, april and may preview, it seems like a club going on a school trip, the girl looks somewhat like mizushima? or a new character but not a vtuber so the vtuber may be a one-off thing?
This series has never failed me even once gadam
Charu seems to have become a Vtuber doujin artist now, they have not done any Roshutsu stuff in years. Which is unfortunate as Nikki and Mizuchima series where clearly left incomplete

so... madoka is still with both akira and hikaru and the canon ain't just a prequel...? would love to see the author do a work on the america time of madoka and hikaru and future akira when madoka returns(post on the akira beach) but that would be a kan timeline(?) or not? either way, would love to see such a situation but the author has not released any new works, especially on the roshutsu shoujo series in awhile so one could only pray.
author is a bit of a troll in how much canon the NTR timeline is, he keeps giving teasers on the possibility of the NTR route existing besides the main canon story, like a shrodinger's ntr.
is mizushima supposed to be hikaru's daughter? i just thought they looked alike and all due to author's art, if so, does it reveal who the father is?
page 30, why did the author say it could be madoka's child and page 28 it was being in america? was'nt america like years ago? big confusion here on the timeline now, anyone?
@nhcasual been waiting for this since you said you've been working on this, goddam hero! thanks for this and this series!
Damn! my fave of this series! you are a hero!!
@nhcasual Codes in order please hehe
You are my hero
Oh and chaps 2, 3, 4 and 5 of the sequel of this series with Hikaru's daughter are also untranslated? Add it to the list too fuck it.

So I was looking around and there are quite a ton of Charu stuff untranslated huh?
Nikki series has random chapters untranslated.
Ran 2 trilogy is fully untranslated too.
Meh I have nothing better to do so I guess I'll check em out for translation.
Thanks. It's so confusing to read in which order 👍
codes for the original "good route" that shows the context of why this is ntr ch1-5: 275659 ch5-9: 275722 ch10: 85054 ch11: 89162
Ntr? Is she had a boyfriend or something?
Oh right forgot the code for the prequel to this my bad 273783
My next goal is to work on translating Akira's Kan ending which is still untranslated.

This is the last released chapter of Hikaru's Kan story, the original japanese manga was published 2 years ago. And the author never did another story about Hikaru since then as far as I know. It is likely that this is the end of her story unless the author does a new chapter eventually.
to be continued?
